text: @joncoopertweets So why aren't @realDonaldTrump, @VP, and @IvankaTrump trump doing the 14-day quarantine like every other American is asked to do if they've been in contact with a #COVID19-infected person? Oh, because THEY can ignore wearing face masks & get tested every freaking day?!!!
